text: Jekara labha nere huda ate yatara halaki hudi tam uha zarura tuhade piche ho jande. Paratu iha mazila (duri de karana) unham la'i aukhi ho ga'i. Huna uha sahu'a khanage ki jekara sade tom ho sakada tam asim zarura tuhade nala calade. Uha apane apa nu tabahi vica dhaka rahe hana. Alaha janada hai ki iha lauka bilakula jhuthe hana
